tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-27 15:53:22" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2012-12-20 00:43:26" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template:
; This file contains the example settings for running a server. It can be used ; as a reference for creating new server options files. Each line is currently ; commented out with a ";". Removing these below will allow you to edit the settings ; using a text editor. ;
[ServerSettings] GameType=DeathMatch UsePassword=$[IsPrivate] Password=$[PrivatePassword] AllowScmdCommands=1 ScmdPassword=$[RConPassword] Port=$[Service.GamePort] BindToAddr=$[Service.IpAddress] BandwidthServer=3 BandwidthServerCustom=1500 LANOnly=0 Dedicated=1 AllowContentDownload=0 MaxDownloadRatePerClient=0 MaxDownloadRateAllClients=0 MaxSimultaneousDownloads=0 MaxDownloadSize=0 RedirectURLs= ContentDownloadMessage= EnableScoringLog=0 MaxScoringLogFileAge=0 AllowVoteKick=1 AllowVoteTeamKick=1 AllowVoteBan=1 AllowVoteNextRound=1 AllowVoteNextMap=1 AllowVoteSelectMap=1 MinPlayersForVote=5 MinPlayersForTeamVote=3 VoteLifetime=30 VoteBanDuration=60 UsePunkBuster=1
[CTF] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] FriendlyFire=0 TeamReflectDamage=0.0 ScoreLimit=8 TimeLimit=20 SuddenDeathTimeLimit=5 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] RespawnWaitTime=4 UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= CTFDefendFlagBaseScore=10 CTFDefendFlagBaseRadius=1000 CTFDefendFlagCarrierScore=10 CTFDefendFlagCarrierRadius=700 CTFKillFlagCarrierScore=10 CTFReturnFlagScore=5 CTFCaptureFlagScore=75 CTFCaptureAssistTimeout=5 CTFCaptureAssistScore=10 CTFFlagLooseTimeout=15 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\CTF_Facility Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\CTF_Streets
[Slowmo CTF] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] FriendlyFire=0 TeamReflectDamage=0.0 ScoreLimit=8 TimeLimit=20 SuddenDeathTimeLimit=5 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] RespawnWaitTime=4 UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= CTFDefendFlagBaseScore=10 CTFDefendFlagBaseRadius=1000 CTFDefendFlagCarrierScore=10 CTFDefendFlagCarrierRadius=700 CTFKillFlagCarrierScore=10 CTFReturnFlagScore=5 CTFCaptureFlagScore=75 CTFCaptureAssistTimeout=5 CTFCaptureAssistScore=10 CTFFlagLooseTimeout=15 SlowMoHoldSecondsPerPoint=10 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\CTF_Facility Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\CTF_Streets
[DeathMatch] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] ScoreLimit=500 TimeLimit=20 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office
[Elimination] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] TimeLimit=3 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseWeaponRestrictions=0 JoinGracePeriod=10 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= NumRounds=3 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office [SlowMoDeathmatch] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] ScoreLimit=0 TimeLimit=20 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= SlowMoNavMarker=1 SlowMoHoldSecondsPerPoint=1 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office
[TeamSlowMoDeathmatch] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] FriendlyFire=0 TeamReflectDamage=0.0 ScoreLimit=0 TimeLimit=20 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= SlowMoNavMarker=1 SlowMoHoldSecondsPerPoint=3 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office
[TeamDeathMatch] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] FriendlyFire=0 TeamReflectDamage=0.0 ScoreLimit=750 TimeLimit=20 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseTeams=1 UseWeaponRestrictions=0 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office
[TeamElimination] RunSpeed=1.2 SessionName=$[HostName] FriendlyFire=0 TeamReflectDamage=0.0 TimeLimit=3 NumRounds=1 MaxPlayers=$[Service.Slots] UseWeaponRestrictions=0 JoinGracePeriod=10 RestrictedWeapons= RestrictedGear= NumRounds=3 Mission0=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Factory Mission1=Worlds\ReleaseMultiplayer\Office
